BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTPAY_OFFLINE_PBR_DUMMY_DTLOG (gnum_slno,STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,DT_OFFLINE_PBR_DATE,STR_PARAMETER_CODE,NUM_PARAMETER_AMOUNT,STR_PARAMETER_TYPE,STR_SALARY_ARREARS_FLAG,STR_SAL_CAT_TYPE,STR_SAL_SUB_CAT_TYPE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) select ?,STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,DT_OFFLINE_PBR_DATE,STR_PARAMETER_CODE,NUM_PARAMETER_AMOUNT,STR_PARAMETER_TYPE,STR_SALARY_ARREARS_FLAG,STR_SAL_CAT_TYPE,STR_SAL_SUB_CAT_TYPE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,?,?,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE from ACTPAY_OFFLINE_PBR_DUMMY_DTL t where t.gnum_isvalid=1 and t.gnum_hospital_code=? and T.DT_OFFLINE_PBR_DATE=? and T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=?
DELETE from ACTPAY_OFFLINE_PBR_DUMMY_DTL t where t.gnum_isvalid=1 and t.gnum_hospital_code=? and t.DT_OFFLINE_PBR_DATE=? and t.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=?
